com.piggybox.bags

Class MergeTuples

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.pig.EvalFunc<T>
      • com.piggybox.utils.SimpleEvalFunc<org.apache.pig.data.Tuple>
        • com.piggybox.bags.MergeTuples

  • public class MergeTuples
extends SimpleEvalFunc<org.apache.pig.data.Tuple>
    Merge all tuples in a bag into an single new tuple.

    Example 

     DEFINE MergeTuples com.piggybox.bags.MergeTuples();
 
 -- input: 
 -- ({(1, a),(2, b),(3, c),(4, d)})
 input = LOAD 'input' AS (B: bag {T: tuple(v1:INT, v2:CHARARRAY)});
 
 -- output: 
 -- ((1, a, 2, b, 3, c, 4, d))
 output = FOREACH input GENERATE MergeTuples(B);

    Author:
    chenxm
